description.value:
Trigger While you have your symbol raised, you are about to take damage from a melee attack.

Your religious symbol glows with sacred energy, turning the attacker's strength to weakness. Attempt a @Check[type:religion|defense:will] check against the triggering creature's Will DC. Regardless of the result, the creature is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} until it spends at least 1 action moving away from you.

Success As critical success, but @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1}.
